system.requirements: Elite Advance, Xenos, Individual willing to perform service, Human Patron.
system.effect: Xenos Character no longer suffers penalty to Interaction and fellowship tests for being Non-Human (such as those from "Speak Not Unto the Alient") so long as the person whom character is speaking to understands the nature of the sanctioning. The character is also officially permitted to set foot on Imperial Worlds as long as their Mark of Sanctioning is visible. This doesn't mean others won't fear or despise the character though, still a Xenos after all.
